akn:section.akn:heading: Benjamin Tallmadge Institute as primary Central Intelligence Agency entity for education and trainin

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Director of the Central Intelligence Agency shall maintain the Benjamin Tallmadge Institute as the primary entity within the Central Intelligence Agency for education and training related to all aspects of counterintelligence.
